  • Classes in de.ikor.sip.foundation.core.declarative.connector used by de.ikor.sip.foundation.core.actuator.declarative
    Class
    Description
    ConnectorDefinition
    Common definition interface for specifying connectors used within a SIP adapter.
  • Classes in de.ikor.sip.foundation.core.declarative.connector used by de.ikor.sip.foundation.core.declarative
    Class
    Description
    ConnectorDefinition
    Common definition interface for specifying connectors used within a SIP adapter.
    InboundConnectorDefinition
    Definition of an inbound connector, which is a specialization of a ConnectorDefinition that initiates an integration call for the integration scenario the connector belongs to.
    OutboundConnectorDefinition
    Definition of an outbound connector, which is a specialization of a ConnectorDefinition that forwards an integration call to an external system and, if necessary, receives its response.
  • Classes in de.ikor.sip.foundation.core.declarative.connector used by de.ikor.sip.foundation.core.declarative.connector
